CustomField.description: This field indicates if manual unlocking is enabled in the MIM UI. The Org Default should be false. To grant this ability, add a custom setting per user or profile.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates if manual unlocking is enabled in the MIM UI. The Org Default should be false. To grant this ability, add a custom setting per user or profile.
CustomField.label: Allow Manual UI Unlock
